Name: Site Preparation
Description: Clear the site and set up initial facilities

Name: Survey and Marking
Description: Survey the site and mark the boundaries

Name: Temporary Facilities
Description: Set up temporary office and storage areas

Name: Foundation
Description: Build the foundation of the building

Name: Superstructure
Description: Construct the main structure of the building

Name: Exterior
Description: Complete the exterior of the building

Name: Interior
Description: Complete the interior of the building

Name: Final Inspection and Handover
Description: Inspect and hand over the completed building

Name: Final Inspection
Description: Conduct final inspection and address issues

Name: Handover
Description: Hand over the completed building to the owner
